vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a CR Community Retail District and a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant on property zoned Tract 3 within Planned Development District No. 44, on the south side of Greenville Avenue, east of Lyndon B. Johnson Freeway
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z201-247(CT)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council before opening the public hearing on December 8, 2021, and is scheduled for consideration on January 12, 2022
